# Byuobu Cheat sheet

|Key binding    |Action             |
|---------------|-------------------|
|F2             |New window         |
|F3             |Previous window    |
|F4             |Next window        |
|F6             |Detach and logout  |
|F8             |Rename window      |
|F7             |Enter scroll mode  |
|Ctrl + C       |Exit scroll mode   |
|Ctrl + F6      |Close window       |
|Shift + F2     |New hrz window     |
|Alt + F2       |New vrt window     |
|Shift + F3     |Previous hrz window|
|Shift + F4     |Next hrz window    |
